sip_features.sip_feature:
HTML

RTL Updates:

  • Removed maxcredits check from the egress port as it ran the risk of preventing routers from power gating.
  • Added assertion to check that the fabric ingress port has sent back all credits prior to letting agents go IDLE.
  • Added cg_en for PCG support (SBC-PCN-004)
    • Added to UPF clamp values
    • Added to CDC control file
    • Added to Synthesis IO Exception file
  • Lintra pops inserted opposite of lintra pushes before the ends of the files
  • Lintra waivers added

Backend Updates:

  • Synthesis now checks for existing elements to detect when to insert scan reset bypass.
  • The Sideband Router setup script now supports the '-x' switch enabling the user to select from a predefined set of tool variations. For this release, supported tool variations are spt, bxt, and chv. To initialize the environment to use the SPT tool versions, the setup script should be sourced as follows: 'source setup -x 'SOC''
  • For previously released Sideband coreKits, it was possible for the user's environment (i.e., Unix PATH) to break scripts in the coreKit. For this release, the coreKit has been modified to use a specific version of Perl selected independently from the user's path. The result is a reduced dependence on the user's environment.
  • UPF file was verified in both SpyglassLP and simulation. The UPF will be verified in the next RTL1p0.

Validation Updates:

Functional Coverage: 96%

Line Coverage: 97%

sip_knissues.sip_knissue:
HTML
  • Most of backend scripts point to the generated RTL top rather than the dynamo wrapper.

sip_speccons.sip_speccon:
HTML

Integration Notes:

  • NOTE: that the Sideband Router map file needs to be updated to replace generic library cells.
